page.title: 05Livery Farm in Chobham
page.content: { {Larkenshaw Farm}has 51 acres. At the moment they have 9{horses}because they only have one helper. Only Mrs McAlister goes horse{riding,}but they don't have a{riding school.}They do {breed horses}but only a little. They train their horses for{dressage}and {show jumping.}They keep horses because they find them interesting and they like them too. They have to get the vet in roughly two to three times a year. They think{hunting}for horses is a very good idea because they like hunting. As well as horses they have chickens, dogs, cats and cattle.
